description: Loads documents from Google Drive using provided credentials.

json_string.display_name: JSON String of the Service Account Token
json_string.info: JSON string containing OAuth 2.0 access token information for service account access

errors.auth_refresh_failed: Authentication error: Unable to refresh authentication token. Please try to reauthenticate.
errors.single_document_load_expected: Expected a single document to be loaded, but got {count} document(s).

logs.credentials_loaded: Credentials loaded from provided creds attribute
logs.creating_credentials: Creating OAuth credentials from token info
logs.loading_from_drive: Loading document from Google Drive - ID: {document_id}
logs.documents_loaded: Successfully loaded {count} document(s) from Google Drive
